talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Since there were parts of that stone
slate that were unaccounted for...<sp:5:0:0>

Well, I assumed it would take much longer
to conclude our investigation.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>To think that you would find the missing
piece and repair it! <sp:5:1:0>I'm honestly in awe
of you.
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Jiahto keeps interacting with dangerous
things. When I object, he insists it's
necessary for his research.
That makes things quite difficult for me,
as it is my job to guard him.<sp:5:1:0> That is why
I gave in to a moment of grumbling.
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>None other. <sp:5:1:0>Traversing this area when it's
covered in sludge would be tricky, to say
the least.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>You already know this, but wearing the
<clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>allows you to climb waterfalls
with ease, even though you're a Hylian.
<snd:Chat_00>Lady Yona is attempting to repair it for
you. She's in the domain, so I suggest
you go and speak with her.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive>Traversing this area when it's covered in
sludge would be tricky, to say the least.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You already know this, but wearing the
<clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>allows you to climb waterfalls
with ease, even though you're a Hylian.
<snd:Sad_00>Ah, but rumor has it...that Lady Yona
may require an <clr:0000>ancient arowana <clr:ffff>in order
to repair it.
If you can find one, I ask that you deliver
it to Lady Yona at once so that she can
repair your <clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>for you.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sigh_01>*sigh* I will never understand the ways
of historians.<sp:5:1:0> Can he not conduct the
investigation more cautiously?
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Oh! <sp:5:1:0>Oh dear. <sp:5:0:0>I certainly hope that you did
not overhear me...<sp:5:0:0>*ahem* grumbling to
myself like that.
It's n-not as it sounds. <sp:5:0:0>Really!
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>Jiahto is a historian, so this kind of thing
is his specialty. He was terribly excited
and is completely transfixed by the ruins.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Jiahto is making a big fuss.


But honestly... <sp:5:0:0>Even if I asked him to
explain his excitement, a soldier like me
probably wouldn't understand.
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive>None other.<sp:5:1:0> Oh, I suppose your reaction
means you have not yet spoken with
Lady Yona.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You already know this, but wearing the
<clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>allows you to climb waterfalls
with ease, even though you're a Hylian.
<snd:Chat_00>Lady Yona is attempting to repair it for
you. She's in the domain, so I suggest
you go and speak with her.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice_01>I see! <sp:5:1:0>So you have already spoken with
Lady Yona.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You already know this, but wearing the
<clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>allows you to climb waterfalls
with ease, even though you're a Hylian.
<snd:Sad_00>Ah, but rumor has it...that she may
require an <clr:0000>ancient arowana <clr:ffff>in order
to repair it.
If you can find one, I ask that you deliver
it to Lady Yona at once so that she can
repair your <clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>for you.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you so much for saving
the domain.

I'm motivated to follow the example of my
esteemed elders so that I can protect
Zora's Domain as best I can.
Take the great Captain Bazz, for instance.<sp:5:1:0>
He went off to the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>to the
west of the domain for an investigation.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>He won't even allow something like that
foul sludge to intimidate him! I aspire to
be that bold one day.
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sigh>Hm. Come to think of it, Captain Bazz has
not yet returned.<sp:5:1:0> Not that there's any
cause for concern, of course.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Notice_01>Prince Sidon can be found at Mipha Court.


I'm sure he'll be overjoyed to see
you, Link.
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>Link!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you so much for saving
the domain.

I'm motivated to follow the example of my
esteemed elders so that I can protect
Zora's Domain as best I can.
Like Captain Bazz! <sp:5:1:0>He went off on an
investigation while the sludge was still
raining down<sp:5:0:0> and returned triumphantly.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>What a LEGEND!<sp:5:1:0> I want to be that strong
one day. If I can become as strong as the
captain, who knows what my future holds.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh_00>Of course, when I told my father all that,
somehow he became even more excited
than I was. Typical.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Happy_01>Hello, there!<sp:5:0:0> Of all people, it's the
one-and-only Link!

Welcome...<sp:5:1:0>is what I'd like to say.<sp:5:0:0>
The thing is, we're conducting an
investigation of the ruins here.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>If you're looking for Prince Sidon, he can
be found at Mipha Court.

That's on the peak of Ploymus Mountain.
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Link!<sp:5:0:0> I'm so grateful that you helped out
with our investigation of the ruins.

Thanks to you, <sp:5:1:0>I can finally give my father
a good report.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Ease>That said... <sp:5:0:0>It is a little embarrassing when
he hears a report of mine and starts
jumping with joy.
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Captain Bazz went off to the <clr:0000>Skyview
Tower <clr:ffff>to the west of the domain for
an investigation.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>He won't even allow something like that
foul sludge to intimidate him! I aspire to
be that bold one day.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sigh>Hm. Come to think of it, Captain Bazz has
not yet returned.<sp:5:1:0> Not that there's any
cause for concern, of course.
talk2011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Captain Bazz went off on an investigation
while the sludge was still raining down
and returned triumphantly.
What a LEGEND!<sp:5:0:0> I want to be that strong
one day.<sp:5:1:0> If I can become as strong as the
captain, who knows what my future holds.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sigh_01>Of course, when I told my father all that,
somehow he became even more excited
than I was. Typical.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sigh>I understand that this is an investigation
of the ruins, but Jiahto is coming into
contact with all kinds of dangerous things.
I wish he would show a little more caution
during his research.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Notice>Hm? You're looking for King Dorephan?


I heard that he left a while back to
investigate the sludge.

That said, I am not allowed to leave here
because I'm on guard duty.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>For all I know, King Dorephan has already
triumphantly returned.
talk2012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Good morning, Link! You know, you really
helped us out with that stone slate.
I'm forever grateful.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad>I understand that this is an investigation
of the ruins, but Jiahto is coming into
contact with all kinds of dangerous things.
I do wish he would show a little more
caution during his research. <sp:5:0:0>As his
appointed guard, it makes me nervous.
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:QuestionNormal>Jiahto seems to be making a big fuss...<sp:5:0:0>
But my job is just to guard him.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease>My father was elated when I was selected
to be a security escort, but I could tell he
was also worried for me.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Thanks to you, Link, I should be able to
calm his fears.
talk2013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ah, it's Link! Allow me to thank you once
again for your help with the matter of the
stone slate.
talk0004: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Right... Do you see that opening there?
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sigh>Thinking back, the waterfalls were filthy
because of the sludge, and even I had a
rough time taking Jiahto here.
It must have been difficult for you to climb
here yourself, Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad_00>Hm... <sp:5:1:0>If only your <clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>was
operational.
talk2014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh! Hello, Link.<sp:5:0:0> You know, you really are a
hero for helping us out with the stone
slate. I can't say it enough.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sigh>Sure...<sp:5:0:0> You know, I was assigned to escort
him, but it feels more like I'm looking after
a child who's found a new favorite toy.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You truly are incredible. To think that you
really found the missing piece of the
stone slate.
talk2015:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Sigh>Captain Bazz has not yet returned from
his investigation.

He went off to that <clr:0000>Skyview Tower <clr:ffff>to the
<clr:0000>west<clr:ffff> of the domain.<sp:5:1:0> I doubt there is any
cause for concern, of course.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Do you know about the road that goes
down to Zora's Domain?<sp:5:1:0> It's probably a
bit treacherous for a Hylian...
<snd:Sad_00>I'm sure you would be better off if you
had a map.<sp:5:0:0> Please be careful out there.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Link!<sp:5:0:0> I'm so grateful that you helped out
with our investigation of the ruins.

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sigh_00>Thinking back, the waterfalls were filthy
because of the sludge, and even I had a
rough time taking Jiahto here.
It must have been difficult for you to climb
here yourself, Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Hm... If only your <clr:0000>Zora armor <clr:ffff>was
operational.
talk2016:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL>I aspire to be as strong as Captain Bazz<sp:5:0:0>
and to serve under King Sidon!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>The cliff crumbled as a result of the
Upheaval, and that revealed these
ancient ruins.
Prince Sidon immediately ordered a
thorough investigation.
